H0.text: What island is noted for its biodiversity and 80% unique wildlife due to more than 80 million years' isolation from continental land mass. Borneo

H1.text: What island is noted for its biodiversity and 80% unique wildlife due to more than 80 million years' isolation from continental land mass. New Guinea

H2.text: What island is noted for its biodiversity and 80% unique wildlife due to more than 80 million years' isolation from continental land mass. Sulawesi

H3.text: What island is noted for its biodiversity and 80% unique wildlife due to more than 80 million years' isolation from continental land mass. Madgascar

A4.text: More than 80% of Madagascar's 14,883 plant species are found nowhere else in the world.

A5.text: Madagascar split from Africa during the Early Jurassic period, around 180 million years ago, and separated from the Indian subcontinent approximately 90 million years ago.
